content: **terms used ** * fpdc perform a double_crochet st around the front post of a st on the previous row * st stitch * slip_stitch slip_stitch * double_crochet double_crochet * chain chain * half_double_crochet half_double_crochet **things you need ** * 75 100 125 200 yards of yarn i used knit picks brava * 4 25mm crochet hook or hook for gauge gauge working hat body repeat row in the round gauge is 3 5 stitches horizontally by 1 5 stitches per inch vertically there is a free video tutorial linked in the pattern you can also view it here 1 1 https //youtu be/fnorajdem9w
